about_the_game:
Rapid Fury is a stylized, fan-made, first-person shooter. At the beginning, the player has access to two arenas. Two additional arenas can be unlocked by defeating the final bosses of the arenas. The intense combat is accompanied by electronic music that helps maintain the rhythm.

The shotgun has two firing modes: primary and secondary (grenade launcher).

After completing each wave, players can level up their skills using experience.

Two game modes are available:. 20 waves and endless arena.

Reach the top of the leaderboard by mastering the mechanics of the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: In Rapid Fury (FPS) you blast the monsters and bosses with a shotgun across four arenas. Choose 20 waves of monsters or endless wave. Level up your skills after each wave. Electronic music helps you maintain your firing rhythm. Master the game and climb the leaderboard to the top. Have a blast!
